# eda

EDA tools

# query_tables { #ibis_birdbrain.tools.eda.query_tables }

`tools.eda.query_tables(question)`

Queries the tables in the database to answer the question

# read_excel_file { #ibis_birdbrain.tools.eda.read_excel_file }

`tools.eda.read_excel_file(filepath, sheet_name='Sheet1')`

Reads an Excel file from the full filepath

filepath should be of the form: <path>/<table_name>.<extension>

# read_delta_table { #ibis_birdbrain.tools.eda.read_delta_table }

`tools.eda.read_delta_table(filepath)`

Reads a Delta Lake table directory from the full filepath

filepath should be of the form: <path>/<table_name>

# list_tables { #ibis_birdbrain.tools.eda.list_tables }

`tools.eda.list_tables()`

Returns a list of available tables to query

# get_table_schemas { #ibis_birdbrain.tools.eda.get_table_schemas }

`tools.eda.get_table_schemas(table_names)`

Returns the schemas of a list of tables
